segments.text: I notice the boy stretching to reach the cookie jar, barely keeping his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is so unstable, and he doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely focused on that plate, missing everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over the sink, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside, it’s a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl doesn’t seem worried at all, just reaching out for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading fast, and the floor is going to be ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how oblivious the woman is to all of this.
segments.speaker: PAR
